Title: Koroshiya 1
Genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Horror, Thriller
Actors: Tadanobu Asano, Nao Ohmori, Shin'ya Tsukamoto, Paulyn Sun
Plot: As sadomasochistic yakuza enforcer Kakihara searches for his missing boss he comes across Ichi, a repressed and psychotic killer who may be able to inflict levels of pain that Kakihara has only dreamed of achieving.
Production: Spike Co. Ltd., Emperor Multimedia Group (EMG) [hk], Omega Project, Omega Micott Inc, Star Max, Excellent Film, Alpha Group
